name: Ventura
description:
Welcome to Opolis, your new home and the bleeding edge of the world! Your new job at Ventura Industries is waiting for you - and so are your coworkers. Might a romance blossom...?

  • 2 romance options
  • 10-20 minutes of gameplay
  • Lesbians!!! 
  • Accessibility options (dyslexia-friendly fonts, screen shaking toggle)

Sound effects: InspectorJ on freesound, Marianne Gagnon
Images from Unsplash, A Place Without Bodies by @spacetwinks on twitter, watchsmart on Flickr
Soundtrack: Aryll Fae // Artificial.Music, Joseph Gilbert/Kistol, Stefan Grosmann
GUI Template: BáiYù, bobcgames, minute, npckc
